/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with cars and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The buildings, predominantly white and beige, rise up on either side of the street, their uniform color palette punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are beige, green, and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing.
